Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioEqualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.SoundEffect
      • ohos.media.audio.AudioEqualizer

  • public class AudioEqualizer
extends SoundEffect
    Represents an audio equalizer, which is used to adjust the frequency response of a specific music source or main output mix sound.
    Since:
    4
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO
